name: PEKO
description: Peko is the perfect fusion between the panda, a beloved symbol in Chinese culture, and the Maneki-neko, the iconic Japanese lucky cat. This unique combination embodies prosperity, good fortune, and financial success for those who hold it. With a distinctive collar inscribed with the name of Trump, currently the President of the United States, Peko symbolizes a message of support and optimism for the crypto world, connecting the international investment community with the belief in luck and financial opportunities. Holding Peko means having more than just a memecoin — it’s a true digital amulet promising to attract fortune in every investment. Make Peko your partner for financial success!
